Sinesis eagerly shakes Twister's hand.

"Partners!" Sinesis says...
  -----=
 Original Message ----- 
  From: ilovealllizards 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com =

  Sent: Friday, August 04, 2000 5:40 PM
  Subject: Re: NBW


  Twister


 =
 *Twister looks at Sinesis*

  Twister: It seems that we have something in =
common and I need a partner too.

  *Twister extends her hand to Sinesis*

=
  Twister: Partner?

  *Twister asks Sinesis with her hand extended*

    -=
---- Original Message ----- 
    From: THECODE 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com =

    Sent: Friday, August 04, 2000 4:45 PM
    Subject: Re: NBW


    "Trav=
eling alone, though? What about all the bots we killed together? What about=
 all of the times we took shots for each other? It's horribly not fair. I w=
ish I had a partner still." Sinesis said. He looked closer at Twister.

   =
 "Hey, will you be my partner?" Sinesis askes Twister...
      ----- Origin=
al Message ----- 
      From: ilovealllizards 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com=
 
      Sent: Friday, August 04, 2000 4:38 AM
      Subject: Re: NBW


    =
  Twister/Blizzard/Infectra



      *Twister looks at the sword and sighs*=


      Twister: I'll have to get used to the fact that, my sister has a li=
fe too and I'll have to learn to travel alone....

      *Twister sighs and=
 slowly and gentley places the energon eagles into her arm compartment*


 =
     *Blizzard looks at Sinister and smiles*

      Blizzard: I wonder what=
's happening back at the base.



      *Infectra smiles back at Airbomber*=


      Infectra: I trust the both of you......I did trust the others but..=
..

      *Infectra sighs*

      Infectra: I need to stop thinking of thin=
gs that upset me. But, it's hard to thinl of the good times because there w=
ere hardly none.

      *Infectra says to Airbomber and grins*


        --=
--- Original Message ----- 
        From: THECODE 
        To: nbwrpg@egrou=
ps.com 
        Sent: Friday, August 04, 2000 4:20 AM
        Subject: Re: =
NBW


        Sinesis frowns. He holds up his brothers sword.

        "He =
left this here, without it, what shall he do? We have simular problems. I j=
ust wish I still had him by my side." Sinesis said to Twister.

        Sin=
ister held Blizzards hand, illegal fireworks shooting off in his eyes.

   =
     Stranato calls out.

        "Hey, any Maximals here?" He yells throug=
h the base. Airbomber sits down and looks to Infectra. He smiles.

        =
"Hopefully, the Maximals will listen to us, they must know of the occurence=
s happening. I trust Stranato, he's always been good. Well, maybe he hasn't=
 always been good, but he's good now." Airbomber said to Infectra. He laugh=
ed at his words...
          ----- Original Message ----- 
          From: =
ilovealllizards 
          To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
          Sent: Thursday=
, August 03, 2000 11:44 PM
          Subject: Re: NBW


          Twister/B=
lizzard/Infectra



          *Twister looks at Sinesis*

          Twister=
: I've decided to let my sister be...For she's my sister and I love her too=
 much to pull her away from the she loves....

          *Twister opens her=
 arm compartment and pulls out a two small pieces of energon both shaped li=
ke an eagle*

          Twister: Our parents gave us both one to unite us a=
s sisters and friends forever and always help each other. I found Blizzard'=
s on the ground in front of the base. I doubt she dropped it by accident...=
..

          *Twister holds out to Sinesis so he can see*



          (OO=
C: Ack! I meant The Team Ultima Base! My bad, Sorry.)

          *Blizzard =
skips out of the cave and walks next to Sinister for The Team Ultima Base a=
nd holds her hand out wanting Sinister to hold her hand*



          *Infe=
ctra follows Stranato and Airbomber into the Maximal Base*


            --=
--- Original Message ----- 
            From: THECODE 
            To: nbwr=
pg@egroups.com 
            Sent: Thursday, August 03, 2000 6:59 PM
       =
     Subject: Re: NBW


            Sinesis sighs and stares at Twister. (S=
orry about earlier.)

            Sinister frowns when he sees Blizar walki=
ng toward the Maximal base.

            "Where are you going? And can I co=
me?" Sinister asked.

            Stranato and Airbomber stop at the Maxima=
l base, since they were never set on enemy and never betrayed the Maximals,=
 they went on in...
              ----- Original Message ----- 
           =
   From: ilovealllizards 
              To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
           =
   Sent: Thursday, August 03, 2000 6:46 PM
              Subject: Re: NBW

=

              Infectra/Wrath/Blizzard/Twister


              *Infectra fo=
llows Stranato and Airbomber towards the Maximal Base*



              *Wr=
ath gets into a CR Chamber when he arives at the Maximal Base awaits his re=
pairs*



              *Blizzard does a little skip out of the cave walks =
next to Sinister for the Maximal Base and holds her hand out towards his wa=
nting to hold hands with him*



              (OOC: Twister is out near th=
e Maximal Base but I'm making her come back anyway.)

              *Twiste=
r leaves the location of the Maximal Base seeing as how everyone was else w=
here and went back to Team Ultimas Base and sits at the same table as Sines=
is*

              Twister: I don't know what I'm going to do....I end up h=
ere thinking I'll find a nice Team where I'm wanted and me and my sister co=
uld be sisters and friends...I was such a fool for believing such happiness=
 could happen.....

              *Twister puts her double sided sword away=
 stares at the table*


                ----- Original Message ----- 
     =
           From: THECODE 
                To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
         =
       Sent: Thursday, August 03, 2000 6:27 PM
                Subject: NBW=



                Stranato and Airbomber walked toward the Maximal base.

=
                Gangon, still dying.

                Deemos and Inzola con=
front one another several times, but Inzola always runs from Deemos.

     =
           Etchingar called out to Megatron.

                "Hey, do I go=
t the job?" He asked.

                Time Bomb waited patiently and Land =
Mine was healed now. Land Mine looked around, looking to meet Megatron.

  =
              Sinister came out of the cave (Hopefully with Blizzard.) and =
started back toward Team Ultima's base.

                Sinesis was healed=
 and sat down next to Twister...
